Raspberry Pi First-Time Hacker Day

University of Sheffield, Department of Computer Science / Access Space

James Wallbank, Hamish Cunningham, October 2rd 2013

Singing Jelly Baby

First build the circuit (see below), then do this stuff from the "command line":

  1. create a work directory
    • mkdir work
    • cd work
  2. install Wiring Pi
    • wget -O wp.deb -r tinyurl.com/wiringpi
    • sudo dpkg -i wp.deb
  3. get the code
    • wget -O jb.sh -r tinyurl.com/pijellybaby
    • chmod +x jb.sh
  4. get the sound effects
    • wget -O police.wav -r tinyurl.com/policewav
  5. run the thing
    • sudo ./jb.sh

Traffic Lights

First build the circuit (see below), then do this stuff from the "command line":

  1. get the code
    • wget -O TrafficLED.py -r tinyurl.com/pitraffic
    • cat TrafficLED.py
  2. run the thing
    • sudo python TrafficLED.py

Stay Safe!

You must change the password on the Pi next time you start up...

Keep in touch...
